title: Rules
context: §605-6 Rules. The supreme court may prescribe qualifications for admission to practice and rules for the government of practitioners. [CC 1859, §1072; RL 1925, §2309; RL 1935, §3608; RL 1945, §9706; RL 1955, §217-6; HRS §605-6; am L 1972, c 184, §1&copy;] Rules of Court See RSC rules 1, 2; Hawaii Rules of Professional Conduct.
